email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emma,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HORIZON for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 225m. Our starting freight quote is USD 45 per MT. The laycan period is from October 15 to October 20, 2023.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high given the current market rates. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 40 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 42 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, applicable only if there is a delay beyond the agreed laydays.

Please let us know if this revised quote meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

We accept the revised rate of USD 42 per MT and the demurrage terms. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork to finalize the agreement. We look forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the documentation and secure the vessel for your shipment. The laycan period remains as October 15 to October 20, 2023. We will keep you updated on any further developments.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson
